feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Flood Warning issued September 10 at 2:48PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR A GLACIER-DAMMED LAKE OUTBURST REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT SUNDAY ALONG KENAI RIVER... * WHAT...Flooding caused by a glacier-dammed lake outburst continues. * WHERE...Kenai River below Skilak Lake, including Kenai Keys. * WHEN...Until noon AKDT Sunday Sep 17. * IMPACTS...Flooding of Kenai River and flood-prone locations is

entry.title: Flood Warning issued September 10 at 9:17AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR A GLACIER-DAMMED LAKE OUTBURST REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT MONDAY FOR KENAI RIVER NEAR COOPER LANDING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by the Snow Glacier-dammed lake outburst continues. * WHERE...Kenai River near Cooper Landing Through Skilak Lake. * WHEN...Until noon AKDT Monday.

entry.title: Flood Warning issued September 11 at 8:40AM EDT until further notice by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Satilla River At Atkinson affecting Brantley County. Additional information is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/forecasts.php?wfo=jax. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 845 AM EDT. &&

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 6:29AM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...PATCHY DENSE FOG THIS MORNING ACROSS THE NORTHEAST GEORGIA MOUNTAIN VALLEYS... Some patchy dense fog will restrict visibilities to less than one-half of a mile across the mountain valleys of northeast Georgia. Be prepared for rapid changes in visibility. The fog should lift after 9AM.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 9:55AM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Areas of Dense Fog Through Midday... Areas of dense fog will limit visibilities to a quarter of a mile or less in some areas this morning, especially in the river valleys. Use caution if traveling, and be prepared for rapid changes in visibility. Conditions should improve by 10 AM to 12 PM as the fog dissipates.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 5:38AM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...PATCHY DENSE FOG THIS MORNING... Patchy dense fog can be expected this morning. Motorists should expect rapidly changing visibility, below 1/2 miles at times.
